message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Would you be willing to sell the product at this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $11,500.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to go down to $12,250. Can we meet at this price?
